shortdesc.ph: Sets a preset voice beautifier effect.
Sets a preset voice beautifier effect.

section.p: Call this method to set a preset voice beautifier effect for the local user who sends an audio stream. Call this method to set a preset voice beautifier effect for the local user who sends an audio stream. After setting an audio effect, all users in the channel can hear the effect. After setting an audio effect, all users in the channel can hear the effect. You can set different audio effects for different scenarios. See Set the Voice Beautifier and Audio Effects. You can set different audio effects for different scenarios. See Set the Voice Beautifier and Audio Effects.

To achieve better audio effect quality, Agora recommends that you call and set the profile to (4) or (5) and scenario to (3) before calling this method. To achieve better audio effect quality, Agora recommends that you call and set the profile to (4) or (5) and scenario to (3) before calling this method.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel. You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter in to (1) or (6), or the method will not take effect. Do not set the profile parameter of to (1) or (6); otherwise, this method call does not take effect.

This method works best with the human voice. Agora does not recommend using this method for audio containing music. This method works best with the human voice. Agora does not recommend using this method for audio containing music.
